recommendations.name: Leading Pedestrian Interval (LPI)
recommendations.description: Gives pedestrians a 3-7 second head start at signalized intersections.

recommendations.name: Roundabout
recommendations.description: Replaces a traditional intersection with a circular design, reducing conflict points.

recommendations.name: Road Diet / Lane Reconfiguration
recommendations.description: Reduces the number of travel lanes and adds features like a two-way left-turn lane or bike lanes.

recommendations.name: Rectangular Rapid Flashing Beacons (RRFB)
recommendations.description: User-activated beacons at unsignalized crosswalks to alert drivers to pedestrians.
